task_info.description: Value Management quarterly plugin updates and PHP upgrade

task_description:
Value Management has asked if we can complete quarterly plugin updates for:
https://www.valuemanagementinc.com/

Please provide:

The list of plugins that need to be updated

An estimate to update them

Additionally, the site is currently running on PHP 7.4.
Please provide a separate estimate for:

Testing the latest PHP version using WP Engine's preview mode after plugin updates

Upgrading PHP if no errors occur

WP Engine access has been provided for Live and Dev environments.

WP Admin access sent for Live:
https://www.valuemanagementinc.com/wp-admin/

If no email was received, use the temporary password:
vq^PZ&RMOAQTfsA(FuQqINnn
task_comments:
Comment 1:
Hello @Mayank Padole,

We have prepared a maintenance plan to keep the website up to date.

Plugin Updates

We will update the following plugins:

Autoptimize: 3.1.13 → 3.1.14
Coming Soon Page, Maintenance Mode, Landing Pages & WordPress Website Builder by SeedProd: 6.18.18 → 6.19.5
Custom Post Type UI: 1.18.0 → 1.18.1
Elementor: 3.31.5 → 3.33.2
Elementor Pro: 3.31.3 → 3.33.2 (manual update required — plugin ZIP file needed)
Safe SVG: 2.3.3 → 2.4.0
WP Cerber Security, Anti-spam, and Malware Scan: 9.6.9 → 9.6.10
Yoast SEO: 25.9 → 26.5

Estimated time: approximately 1.5 hours.
If any critical issues are found after updates, we will notify immediately.

WordPress Core & Theme Updates

WordPress: 6.8.3 → 6.9

Theme updates:
Twenty Twenty-Five: 1.3 → 1.4
Twenty Twenty-Four: 1.3 → 1.4

PHP Upgrade Plan

We tested PHP 8.3 and encountered critical errors related to Elementor (screenshot available).
These issues are expected to be resolved after updating Elementor and Elementor Pro.

After upgrading PHP, some plugins or themes may need additional updates for compatibility.

Estimated time for PHP upgrade and compatibility adjustments: approximately 2 hours.

Communication

If any critical issues are identified during or after updates, we will inform you promptly with details and recommended next steps.

Thanks,
Sagar Parmar

Comment 3:
Maintenance Breakdown Shared with Client

We reviewed the website and prepared estimates divided into three parts:

Website Updates
PHP Updates
Form Testing

These tasks can be performed quarterly once approved.

1. Website Updates

Plugin updates (as listed above)
WordPress core update: 6.8.3 → 6.9
Theme updates: Twenty Twenty-Five and Twenty Twenty-Four

Estimated time: 2 hours
Any critical issues will be communicated immediately.

2. PHP Upgrade

Tested PHP 8.3 and found Elementor-related errors
Issues expected to resolve after Elementor updates
Additional compatibility fixes may be required

Estimated time: 2 hours

3. Form Testing & Security Checks

Full testing of all forms
Website security review

Estimated time: 1 hour

Total estimated time: 5 hours

Comment 4:
Work Execution Summary

Hello @Mayank Padole,

Summary of updates performed on staging and production:

Full backup created for staging site
PHP upgraded to version 8.2

Plugins updated:
Autoptimize
SeedProd
Custom Post Type UI
Elementor
Elementor Pro
Safe SVG
WP Cerber Security
Yoast SEO

Themes:
No updates available

Issues Identified & Resolutions

Font difference issue resolved by clearing Kirki font cache
Critical error in widget-helpers.php resolved by updating Elementor Pro
PHP notice related to breakpoint_medium variable fixed in theme

Validation & Deployment

All issues resolved successfully
Updates applied to live site
Live site functioning correctly:
https://www.valuemanagementinc.com/

Please let us know if post-deployment monitoring is required.

CC: @Dhaval Prajapati, @Killol Joshi
Thanks,
Sagar Parmar

Comment 5:
Final Verification

Hello @Sagar Parmar,

Both staging and live sites have been verified after updates.

Backup confirmed

Staging URL: https://valuemgmtdev.wpengine.com/
Live URL: https://www.valuemanagementinc.com/

Backend and frontend recordings reviewed for both environments.
Contact form tested successfully and client email updated.

Additional checks:

Broken links: 2 found
Security scan: No malware detected
Spam comments: None found

Page speed results:
Mobile score: 60
Desktop score: 95

CC: @Mayank Padole, @Killol Joshi, @Dhaval Prajapati

Regards,
Sejad Patani
